title: Priyanka Chopra's comfort zone
content:
Prev  
By The Hitlist Team | Posted 1 hour  
 

 
The countdown for her show Quantico’s telecast next week has begun and Priyanka Chopra is a bundle of nerves. 
 

Priyanka Chopra 
 
Currently, she is in Montreal for the shoot and her mom, Madhu Chopra, is by her side. 
 
The actress finds it comforting to return home to mommy after hectic shooting schedules for long, comforting conversations.
